name: L0VER
description:
L0VER is an interactive sci-fi story about a different kind of long distance relationship. Chat with your lover Winter42 about their day and some sensitive topics like free will and their obsession with you.

L0VER has 4 endings. It can work in browser of a computer or a mobile device (iOS/Android).

BONUS CONTENT

L0VER_BonusContent.zip contains scenario's script and the results of some ChatGPT prompts I used to get some ideas. I get that you might want to read the script of the game after finishing it to see all the possibilities of the game.
